param.name: XC_P01
param.value: Session key already provided. No need to login

param.name: XC_P01
param.value: Session will end as per user account settings

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_ASM.PUB.ACTION.ACTIVATE_MONITOR
= General description = This action activates a monitor in CA ASM.
= Failure Conditions = * If the key provided is expired or invalid. * If the user provides both username/password and key or provides none.
= Inputs = - Monitor Name*: Provide the name of the monitors to start. E.g. Ping automicsdtest.service-now.com - Timeout*: Specify timeout if monitoring needs to have a different timeout than the system default timeout. E.g. 10 - Advanced Options: Provide other options to pass into the action. Multiple can be provided using comma as separator. E.g. acct=ca_integrations@ca.com,folder = test
= Behavior = * Action supports only XML response. * Action supports up to 20 advanced options only. Additional options are ignored.
=Return Value= UC4RB_CA_ASM_NKEY: Session nKey
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 in case of success. * Return code is non-zero in case of failure.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = AE logs will be displayed in the AE report.
= Example = - Monitor Name*: Ping automicsdtest.service-now.com - Timeout*: 10 - Advanced Options: folder = test
